name: Coming Out (Wilhelm9218)
description:
The Coming Out Game is an eye-opening activity meant to educate allies, family, and friends of LGBTQIA+ individuals on the struggles of coming out. Based on an activity called "Coming Out Stars," this game has been adapted to work as a stand-alone program to be used solo. 

This game is 100% FREE for all to use, and cross-posted on multiple platforms, to hopefully reach a wide audience! Donations are always greatly appreciated and will help me make future projects~

The game also contains a catalogue of resources for LGBTQIA+ individuals and allies! 

Note from the creator: This is my FIRST GAME ever made, and I'm hoping to build more and keep improving on my skills as a designer and self-taught programmer!
